response.overview: According to The Independent, the band, along with Morgan Nicholls, spent the day after the Leeds Carling Weekend recording three tracks for Live from Abbey Road, a new Channel 4 series. The venue was EMI's Abbey Road Studios.  Dan Newell, the band's live trumpeter, was drafted in for the first time at this performance. Matthew Bellamy can be seen playing/improvising a piece on the piano on video, which bears a slight resemblance to some of the piano work in Exogenesis: Symphony. It is pure speculation however whether this was one of the snippets of piano Bellamy used to put together the Symphony.  28th August 2006
response.title: Muse: Live at Abbey Road 2006
